THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail visually reinforces the title by featuring the PregaHope product packaging prominently, repeatedly using the phrase 'Fertility Friendly Lubricant', and integrating the Prega News Expert Pregnancy Care Partner branding, all of which match the words in the video title.
